name: Groovy Garden Game
description:
Groovy Garden Game (alpha)

You are a gardener, and you have some wonderful flowers growing in your garden. You are having a lovely day, watering and picking flowers, when your flowerbeds are infested with some nasty bugs. Pick all the flowers, and try to stay away from the bugs!

All assets including music are by Moosifear, except the well, the stones and the flowers - & main player character, by Kam - her contact info is available on request
